title: Between a Stormy and Peaceful Everyday
detail_text: <:th_ch0210/>*Sigh*....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Heeey, what’s wrong, Shiotti? Why the long face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, Ai-san. It’s nothing. I was just thinking that it’s so peaceful today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>....Did something happen? Did Kaoruko-sensei do something bad again?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>This was back during New Year’s, but.... She said she’s making a special boxed dish with specialties from around the world. However, only she could make it as no one else had visited those countries. Our kitchen was like a different world entirely at the end, as if a disaster had struck it. And this was just after we did our New Year’s cleaning, mind you....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>A different world, huh? It must’ve been a scary sight to see, even for me....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>She also woke me up and told me to get on her bike just to watch the first sunrise of the year....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>O-, oh.... That’s Kaoruko-sensei for you.... You look somewhat happy, though, Shiotti?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Well, a lot happened, but it’s been a while since I got to spend New Year’s with her....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ah, so that’s it! It must’ve been a blast, right, Shiotti? You’re still Kaoruko-sensei’s little sister, after all. That face you made was just you being hungry for some spice in your life, huh~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eeeh!? No, it wasn’t! There’s no way that’s true! What are you grinning for, Ai-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
